title: What are some things you enjoyed as a child but are considered inappropriate for children by modern society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gilbert chemistry sets.   You know the ones, the ones with the Real chemicals.    One can actually do some experiments and if off by a bit, do some damage to the home............... {Which is why my dad built me a concrete testing pad in the back of our house...................  way away from the house...........} Of course, since the Gilbert chemistry sets didn't have all the chemicals I needed, I was able (at age 12) to get my dad to take me to a Chemical Distribution center where I was able to buy some Real chemicals like Red Fuming Nitric acid.    How else can a pre-teen make Nitroglycerin or rocket fuel.............. Ahhhh the good old days.   My 7th grade science teacher called me:  "Doctor Strangelove"......
